- Fix Phantasm stage access when Extra and Phantasm are both set to linear
- Fix locations checking themself after a collect and rewrite of the score calculation
- Fix location 'Alice defeated' not existing when check by difficulty is active
- Fix traps not being received correctly
- Remove Max Rank trap

v1.1.0.description:
- Option added that randomized the Cherry Border. Either as one item or as 6 progressive items, where each additional item decreases the value needed to activate it by 5000
- "No Cherry Trap"  added, which reset the current cherry and cherry+ to 0
- Option added to shorten the stage 4, making it start at Lily White
- Patch to removed the anti-temper check
v1.1.0.title: v1.1.0

v1.1.1.description:
- Fix client crash after completing the Extra or Phantasm stage
- Fix access to the Phantasm stage (Linear) in Normal mode
v1.1.1.title: v1.1.1

v1.1.2.description:
- Fix logic when exclude_lunatic is true
- Fix Victory Condition when Yukari is selected but Phantasm Stage is excluded
- Replace option_definitions (deprecated) by options_dataclass
v1.1.2.title: v1.1.2

v1.1.4.description: - Fix Extra stage (linear) not staying unlocked after a restart in normal mode
v1.1.4.title: v1.1.4

v1.2.0.description:
* Option changed: Difficulty is now a toggle and the option to make lower difficulty check when doing a higher one has been added separately
* Option added: Deathlink amnesty added and possiblity to change the trigger by either life or game over
* Option added: Possibility to add a limit to the max number of life and bomb that the client give to the game (does not affect logic)
* Added a GuardRail that will check for incoherence
* ItemGroup added for characters, allowing to hint with shorter name (Ex: "Reimu A")
* Traps that can't be applied more than once in a stage will not be queued anymore
* Manifest added
* slotData changed to only have necessary values
* Better client stability
* Better error messages in the client
* Simplified how the client looked for the game. It doesn't need powershell anymore and will only check for the name of the game
* Fix ItemClassification
* Added client commands to change the following options at any time: DeathLink, DeathLinkAmnesty, DeathLinkTrigger, RingLink, Limits, MultipleDifficultyCheck and ShorterStage4
v1.2.0.title: v1.2.0

v1.2.1.description:
- Fix Option "Short Stage 4 that wasn't taking into account
- Fix DeathLink on a Game Over which could be triggered two time
- The client now wait a little when the game return to the menu
v1.2.1.title: v1.2.1
